Text:
OK.  I've downloaded 10% and I've already uploaded 100mb downloaded 39.7.  This shows people really need to learn how to port forward.  It's easy.  Then just seed to a ratio of 3.  I just set my seed limit to 3 and seed my torrents.

I should not have seeded 3 times more then I've downloaded when I'm at 10%, ever.

Saradrea, make sure to remind people to seed.
